des:
Control your home appliances by voice commands using Firefly Automation and Amazon Alexa. 

The Firefly Connect skill can be used to voice control Lights, Fans, AC, Geyser, Pumps, TV, Set-top Box, Heater or any other electrical appliance.

Once the Firefly Connect skill is enabled and your Firefly account is verified and linked, you can discover your devices by saying, “Alexa, discover my devices” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home section of the Alexa app.

Here are some of our favourite phrases to get started:

“Alexa, turn on the light”
“Alexa, set bedroom fan to 50%”
“Alexa, turn off the AC”
“Alexa, turn on the garden lights”
“Alexa, turn on the water pump”

- Your physical switches work normally with Firefly Smart Switches. You can also schedule your lights and fans using the Firefly Connect application.
- No smart home hub is required. The Firefly devices directly connect to your home WiFi Router allowing seamless integration. 
- Create Groups of Smart Home devices in the Alexa app to control them together. 

To use this skill you will need a Firefly account and Firefly Smart Switches. You can create a Firefly account using the Firefly Connect application on iOS or Android and configure your Firefly devices to connect to your home WiFi network.

Now, you can control all the gadgets connected to your Firefly Smart Switches without having to reach for your phone or tablet. Just say it and Alexa will take care of it for you. Welcome to the world of Internet of Things.

For more information about Firefly Automation, visit http://www.fireflyautomation.in
